name: Xingqiu
desc: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

elemSkill.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
elemSkill.desc: Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character. The Rain Swords have the following properties: 路When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken. 路Increases the character's resistance to interruption. 20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%. The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3. Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character. "Easier to slay a rain dragon than to sever the rain."

elemBurst.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
elemBurst.desc: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords. Rainbow Bladework 路Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG. 路Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration. The "Way of the Rain Cutter" is one of the esoteric secret techniques of the Guhua Sect.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Guhua Style
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

c13ns.name: The Scent Remained
c13ns.desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

c13ns.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
c13ns.desc: Extends the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.\nDecreases the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

c13ns.name: Weaver of Verses
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Evilsoother
c13ns.desc: Throughout the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

c13ns.name: Embrace of Rain
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
c13ns.desc: Activating 2 of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit opponents.
